title.rendered: Polish Pierogis with Cheddar and Potatoes (plus extra bacon!)

content.rendered: Impress your friends when they come over with these made-from-scratch Cheddar and Potatoes Pierogis! Besides, this special doesn’t require a long list of fancy ingredients, so it’s perfect when you feel like you don’t want to leave the house to go grocery shopping. Now, the Polish culinary experts say that the secret to ideal pierogis lies as much in the filling as in the dough. The dough should be flexible, smooth and soft, and the good part is, you only need three simple ingredients to make it! There’s no time to lose, head to the kitchen and roll up your sleeves! Before you know it, homemade pierogis will be ready to eat on your plate 🙂
